StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Large Scale Genotyping of Psychiatric Disorders

Person.Organization: ICAHN SCHOOL OF MEDICINE AT MOUNT SINAIMASSACHUSETTS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGYBROAD INSTITUTE, INC.MASSACHUSETTS GENERAL HOSPITAL

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The datasets used for the analysis described in this manuscript were obtained from dbGaP at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap through dbGaP accession number [insert accession #]. Samples used for data analysis were provided by a collaboration of over 50 groups, working together through the Psychiatric Genomics Consortium (https://www.med.unc.edu/pgc). Support for these samples include support from NIMH including [U01 MH096296, R01 MH094469], the Stanley Center for Psychiatric Research, the Gerstner Family Foundation, and Mount Sinai School of Medicine Friedman Brain Institute.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution responded that the study is not sensitive without submitting a new Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.
Display of Variants and Alleles is consistent with the informed consent.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
Display of Variants and Alleles is not consistent with the informed consent.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Mental Health - Disorders Related to OCD Only, MDS, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-MHOCD-MDS-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Mental Health - Disorders Related to OCD Only and related disorders. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
Display of Variants and Alleles is consistent with the informed consent.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (ADHD and Related Conditions, MDS, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ADHD-RC-MDS-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to ADHD and Related Conditions and related disorders. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
Display of Variants and Alleles is consistent with the informed consent.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Attention deficit hyperactive disorder, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ADHD-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Attention deficit hyperactive disorder. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
Display of Variants and Alleles is consistent with the informed consent.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Schizophrenia and related disorders, MDS, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-SZRD-MDS-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Schizophrenia and related disorders and related disorders. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
Related conditions include conditions with genetic evidence of genetic relationships to schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder. Display of Variants and Alleles is NOT consistent with the informed consent.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Neurological Disorders Research, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-NDR-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Neurological Disorders Research. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
DUL includes mental health disorders and neurology Display of Variants and Alleles is consistent with the informed consent.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Mental Health Disorders Research, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-MHDR-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Mental Health Disorders Research. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
Display of Variants and Alleles is consistent with the informed consent.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Bipolar Disorder, NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BPD-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Bipolar Disorder. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
Display of Variants and Alleles is consistent with the informed consent.

ConsentGroup.title: Mental Heath and Cognition in Adults over 18 years of age
ConsentGroup.name: MH-AO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Display of Variants and Alleles is consistent with the informed consent.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
Display of Variants and Alleles is consistent with the informed consent.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
Display of Variants and Alleles is consistent with the informed consent.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Obsessive Compulsive Disorder and other psychiatric conditions, NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-OCD-OPC-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Obsessive Compulsive Disorder and other psychiatric conditions. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Schizophrenia and related disorders, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-SZRD-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Schizophrenia and related disorders. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Mental Health Disorders Research, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-MHDR-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Mental Health Disorders Research. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

StudyTo.name: dbGaP Collection: Compilation of Individual-Level Genomic Data for General Research Use
